duties_responsibilities.duty: The Materials Department Manager will be responsible for the Construction Materials Department (Laboratory and Technicians) Supervise and schedule a team of technicians providing services to both public and private clients.
Focus in soils, concrete, asphalt, and steel testing.
Help market clients and answer their questions.
Review field and laboratory test and data.
Must be able to troubleshoot construction problems and provide technical guidance and direction to field personnel.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering (Master's preferred)
Licensed Professional Engineer (P.E.) for the state of Texas
